ValidationRule.description: Project Apollo: Partner Level is required when Status = (Active OR Cancelled OR Credit Hold) AND Type = (Partner - Reseller OR Partner - Hybrid OR Partner - Referral)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Partner', OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Active'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Credit Hold') ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Partner - Reseller'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Partner - Hybrid'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Partner - Referral') ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Partner_Level__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Partner Level is required when Status is 'Active', 'Cancelled', or 'Credit Hold' AND Type is 'Partner - Reseller', 'Partner - Hybrid', OR 'Partner - Referral'.
